pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, December 5, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ingersoll, Ontario

Private meetings

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford, will mark a milestone in manufacturing electric vehicles here in Canada and hold a media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Ottawa, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a candle lighting ceremony in celebration of Hanukkah, and deliver brief remarks.

Closed to media
